message:
Hello there!

Thank you for joining the Mom and Pop's team. This email, and subsequently this email account, indicates that you have joined the Mom and Pop's Flag Shop team! Congratulations on your new position with us, and we are exited to work with you.

The mompopsflags accounts prepare us to transition into using our business accounts to converse with other teams and partners. However, as the server currently cannot send emails to external accounts, this email service is primarily used for internal communication.

We look forward to work with you!

Sincerely,
Mom and Pop

Founders
Mom & Pops Flag Shop
subject: Welcome to Mom & Pops Internal Email System - Please Read Me
